document_title: Hydatid disease: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Rice tapeworm (also known as pork tapeworm, pork tapeworm) has the scientific name Taenia Solium. People get sick from eating raw or undercooked pork. The disease appears in many parts of the world, especially in Vietnam, rice cysticercosis has been recorded in all provinces and cities.
subsection_title: san lon gao.json. What is rice fluke?
subsection_data:
san lon gao.json. What is rice fluke?
Rice tapeworm (also known as pork tapeworm, pork tapeworm) has the scientific name Taenia Solium. People get sick from eating raw or undercooked pork. The disease appears in many parts of the world, especially in Vietnam, rice cysticercosis has been recorded in all provinces and cities.
